html:
1.16.19  6:23 pm   1.15.19  1:45 pm

You said "if there was a way to guarantee a song will sell, surely everyone would be doing it"

True. Btw, Just to be clear, I'm not the one making the argument. It's other people. And man!, some of the song just sound so good.

But the most common genre of music that gets this criticism is Country music. They say that they all sound the same and talk about the same stuff in their songs.

?

     'all sounds the same' has a different meaning depending on whether you like or dislike the sound

1.16.19  6:13 pm   i'm having trouble doing my art because i keep worrying about how hard it seems

     do it simpler first, because you can have just as much fun while learning at the same time, which is also fun, so that fun will be added cumulatively to the fun you were already having

1.16.19  6:09 pm   what is by far, your most favorite chord?

     Gbsus2ma7 over Bb

1.16.19  5:05 pm   am i a boy

     it's possible

1.16.19  4:56 pm   How do you feel when you put out a video for people to view

     good

1.16.19  4:47 pm   Do you ever find that the right rhythm feel goes out of grid?

     yes

1.16.19  4:33 pm   1.14.19  10:40 pm , normal by what standards??!

     the Royal Academy of Music

1.16.19  4:23 pm   in your song "La de da de da de da de day oh", is "where did all the bad times roll?" meant to mean the opposite of "where did all the good times go?" or is it meant to mean where have said bad times been rolling to get to the point where they're as bad as they are? i need answers

      it meant to sound simultaneously the same and different to the corresponding line in the 1st chorus. added bonus is that i was able to invoke the classic saying "the good times roll" without saying it exactly, because 'good' had already been said

1.16.19  4:08 pm   is the zhswzhswzhswzhsw in "at the airport terminal" a lip trill?

     i don't think so

1.16.19  4:08 pm   Would you ever want to visit Estonia?

     yes

1.16.19  3:43 pm   How did you animate the notes on the paper so smoothly with the music? Also have you considered creating a discord server? 

     it's done exactly the same way i do words. it's 1 picture for each word or syllable

1.16.19  3:24 pm   is "just did a bad thing" a continuation of "gonna do the thing (finally do the thing)?"

     no

     are any of your songs types of continuations of other songs?

     sometimes, but they have never been released that way

     is there a specific timeline/lore?

     some of them have it, but unfortunately they are not usually released that way due to the disparacy of the time it takes to record compared to the time it takes to write

     or do you just do it for fun?

     much much more

1.16.19  3:21 pm   what do you make music for

     you, for example

1.16.19  3:16 pm   what did you mean in that one song from that one time

     everything's gonna be just fine

1.16.19  3:13 pm   what are your picks for the oscar nominations this year?

     the egg

1.16.19  3:12 pm   Why did you decide to upload 'We could just get High' without a video?

     so more people could hear it

     Just stands out as unusual on your channel.

     i know, that's what i always tell people who demand i release songs 'without video' to 'save time'

      Nice song.

     thank you

1.16.19  3:11 pm   Do you like the reality you're living in right now?

     it's ok

     If not, what reality would you like to be in? 

     52C

1.16.19  2:32 pm   good job on "at the airport terminal", both the song but very especially the video.  feels like you've crossed the barrier into more interesting video stuff, which was already very excellent

     that's nice of you, i actually felt like i was crossing some barriers backwards, to stuff i have done before

1.16.19  2:22 pm   What are thoughts on racism?

     no one ever admits to doing it

1.16.19  2:18 pm   I think your vine-length anything videos are just so great. Would it make your dream schedule of alternating songs and anything videos every other week any easier if you made the anything videos short, ten second ones, rather than the 1 minute + length ones?

     10 seconds is kind of a sore subject for me because i did way too many of them and then due to circumstances it became a good career move to make even more. so it is a good format but i feel i already did that way too much at the expense of other more in depth things i could have been doing

1.16.19  2:08 pm   what should i do after graduating art school?

     make art but you should have been doing that before too

1.16.19  1:46 pm   There's a lot of nice 3D sections in "at the airport terminal". Most of your animation tends towards 2D cliparts and text jumping around the screen, so what was it like animating this?

     simple because those ones were very simple

      And how long did it take to render?

     it is still rendering

1.16.19  1:41 pm   do you do music full time?

     and video

1.16.19  1:35 pm   is there some sort of autotune on the bzshwwwwww and brrrrrrr in the last song?

     no

     it sounds like there is. thanks. bye.

     ah, that's the curse of the modern age. sing in tune and get accused of using auto tune

1.16.19  12:59 pm   how come you mention so many four syllable states in your song "in california" but don't mention massachusetts. i wanna know what you can do in massachusetts

     smoke marijuana

1.16.19  12:54 pm   is it weird that sometimes when i listen to the chord progression of a song i visualize the root motion in my head by imagining a piano keyboard (btw I always do that in the key of C or Cm like they are the default keys)

     no

1.16.19  12:51 pm   hey man i need something to draw so help me out bb


jus gimme sumtin, anythin


except a drawing you sly motherfucker

     how about this

1.16.19  12:23 pm   What is close front unrounded vowel

     eeeeeeeeeeeee

1.16.19  11:58 am   any long videos planned now that you're of the schedule?

     there is one i would like to do but i will never have any time to do it if i want to do anything else, which i do

1.16.19  11:51 am   i just noticed that your two latest songs are pretty much the same length. is that a coincidence?

     yes

1.16.19  11:18 am   so what happened to monday videos

     i posted them all online

1.16.19  10:45 am   You ever have a dream where, upon waking, you have a really catchy, totally original part of a tune on repeat?

     yes. this is where you're gonna wanna write that down immediately

1.16.19  10:39 am   How can we get in touch with you to see if we can do any work together?

     you could send some electronic-mail

1.16.19  10:14 am   what are your thoughts on high fidelity in your music production?  

     it is getting better gradually, 1 step at a time

     I currently have "When I Get Older" playing on a good set of headphones and I'm really impressed with the sound quality. 

     that's nice of you

1.16.19  10:06 am   how do i know its not you asking the questions

     you would have to see one of your own get answered

1.16.19  9:47 am   Do you wanna make short videos again? I miss them a lot now

     all of my videos are short

1.16.19  9:42 am   why did ya break your twitter streak

     because i'm a fucking loser and i was trying to get the song done and i just fucking lost it. don't worry i am getting it back

1.16.19  9:36 am   this just crossed my mind but i'd imagine you've made your own after effects/premiere plugins to do the weird surreal text effects on your videos, am i right or do you manually do them all each time?

     i have some things saved, but some of those things are impossible to save as 1 effect. also i have never used that program

1.16.19  9:28 am   at the end of 'at the airport terminal' i like to image that theres a low D in the bass in between the Bb and the F right at the end. did this cross your mind while you were writing it?

     no but that seems reasonable

1.16.19  9:21 am   how do you stop the bad dreams?

     i don't know

1.16.19  9:06 am   when is the new song

     soon

      and why haven't you released anything since "just did a bad thing"

     perhaps you are not paying attention

1.16.19  9:02 am   Do you have any thought about 9 August ?

     no

1.16.19  8:41 am   I'm thinking the Airport Terminal song you released is a metaphor for life and death...
Would I be quite accurate?

     everything is, probably

      I have some reasons ehy I think it could be:

0:30 "I think I'm dying but I'm just being born"
Pretty self explanatory

0:37 "Through the terminal we all shall go"
We all have to die, it's terminal

The repeated use of "unusual" between 0:48 and 1:01 might be hinting towards death, as death would feel very unusual

1:06 "And I'm saying goodbye to the world I know"
Again, death, leaving the world behind

1:15 "Through the terminal we all can grow"
Rebirth perhaps?

1:20 "And it's time to let go"
Letting go of the world, accepting your death

1:43 "...Imagining where all the planes are going"
Reference to the possible existence of heaven?

1:56 "I'm on the next flight"
Rebirth

2:02 "We'll fly through the night till the day becomes bright"
Being in a mother's womb until being born

2:05 "until the night returns"
Until death again

2:31 "One day soon we'll all be together"
We will all join each other after death

     you are going to have a blast once you realize how far and wide you can use this analogy

1.16.19  8:33 am   what are your thoughts on thinking about thoughts that make you think about thoughts?

     need some feelings to go with it

1.16.19  8:16 am   why is it that when I downloaded "la de da de da de da de day oh" from the songs category and I opened it I saw a thumbnail of mount st. helens?

     that seems impossible to me, because the mount st helens song and image were not made until many months after la de da was uploaded

1.16.19  8:09 am   how to invent tomatoless ketchup

     don't worry, it's already been invented and is ubiquitously popular the world over

1.16.19  8:09 am   That "hay" before the final chorus of the Airport Terminal video, was your decision to not animate it follow Monday good firetruck logic?

     it's a pretty boring line, and i needed an unexpected twist to distract from how boring it was

1.16.19  7:56 am   how do you stay motivated

     want the results, or enjoy the process. sometimes both. if neither then i don't know why this question would even arise, actually

1.16.19  7:38 am   Bill wurtz don't swear? 

     9.21.18  10:55 am, 4.14.18  7:02 am, 6.20.17  5:15 pm

1.16.19  7:27 am   also what colour should my new dress be, burgundy or dark green?

     if you can get it to be both at the same time you could get that next viral paradox everyone has been waiting for
